testcase.name: getCategories should return categories sorted by position
addPhoto should fail for non-existent category
removePhoto should remove photo from category
initialization should create sample data
getAllCategoriesWithPhotos should return all categories with their photos
getCategoryWithPhotos should return null for non-existent category
getAllPhotoPaths should return all photo paths for backward compatibility
removeCategory should remove category and all its photos
getCategory should return correct category by id
removeCategory should fail for non-existent category
addCategory should add valid category successfully
getCategory should return null for non-existent id
addPhoto should add valid photo successfully
getPhotosForCategory should return photos for specific category
addPhoto should fail for invalid photo
removePhoto should fail for non-existent photo
addCategory should fail for invalid category
addCategory should fail for duplicate category id
getPhotosForCategory should return empty list for non-existent category
getCategoryWithPhotos should return category with its photos
